subject: Regarding order No. #SSN4448
description_text:
Hello,
I cannot see U-shaped mounting brackets for haptic  reactors on my order
list. This is strange since I’ve added them when making my order.

Could I ask why is that? And if by some chance I haven’t added them to my
order, is there a way that I can pay for those, and you’ll include them in
my main order? I don’t want to make a separate inquiry just for these two
small parts.

With regards,
Buyer

conversations.body_text: Hi Johnny D,    Don't worry, it has already been added to your order. As an accessory, it won't appear on the order.

Thank you so much for the answer. I was really worried about that. Can’t
wait till I test those pedals out! Have a nice day!

On Wed, 10 Dec 2025 at 08:20, service@simsonn.com
